name: Fragment Terminal
description:
This game is pretty self explanatory. You need to navigate falling planforms and a terrible interface to get to the end of the level. I tried to be as clear as possible with what's happening as it happens. 

I also am submitting this game minutes before the jam timer runs out so I didn't have time to write a real description or anything like that :D

I also want to add that I'd love to add more mechanics to this if there's even a little interest in the project. I wanted 5-10 levels, I ended up with 3. 

When you play the game use the exe labelled PLAY ME, not the actual unity game.

Also, if you have a 4k monitor, you're going to have a bad time and I'm sorry.
